Specimen Type: Cytology brushings (cells scraped from mucosal surfaces)
Purpose: To accurately process, stain, examine, and report cytology brushings for diagnostic evaluation, including detection of malignancy or infection.
Container: Properly labeled cytology brush container or vial with 95% ethanol fixative
Equipment: Light microscope, staining setup (Pap stain reagents, alcohols, xylene), glass slides
